verses.text_plain: And when Athaliah the mother of Ahaziah saw that her son was dead, she arose and destroyed all the seed royal.
verses.verse_html:
1And when Athaliah the mother of Ahaziah saw that her son was dead, she arose and destroyed all the seed royal. ▼
▼ seed…: Heb. seed of the kingdom

footnotes.body_text: ▼ seed…: Heb. seed of the kingdom
footnotes.body_html: ▼ seed…: Heb. seed of the kingdom

verses.text_plain: But Jehosheba, the daughter of king Joram, sister of Ahaziah, took Joash the son of Ahaziah, and stole him from among the king’s sons which were slain; and they hid him, even him and his nurse, in the bedchamber from Athaliah, so that he was not slain.
verses.verse_html:
2But Jehosheba, the daughter of king Joram, sister of Ahaziah, took Joash the son of Ahaziah, and stole him from among the king’s sons which were slain; and they hid him, even him and his nurse, in the bedchamber from Athaliah, so that he was not slain. ▼
▼ Jehosheba: also called, Jehoshabeath
 , ▼
▼ Joash: also called, Jehoash

tokens.text: so that he was not slain

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Jehosheba: also called, Jehoshabeath
▼ Joash: also called, Jehoash

verses.text_plain: And he was with her hid in the house of the Lord six years. And Athaliah did reign over the land.
verses.verse_html: 3And he was with her hid in the house of the Lord six years. And Athaliah did reign over the land.

tokens.text: And he was with her hid

verses.text_plain: And the seventh year Jehoiada sent and fetched the rulers over hundreds, with the captains and the guard, and brought them to him into the house of the Lord, and made a covenant with them, and took an oath of them in the house of the Lord, and shewed them the king’s son.
verses.verse_html: 4And the seventh year Jehoiada sent and fetched the rulers over hundreds, with the captains and the guard, and brought them to him into the house of the Lord, and made a covenant with them, and took an oath of them in the house of the Lord, and shewed them the king’s son.

tokens.text: them to him into the house
with them, and took an oath

verses.text_plain: And he commanded them, saying, This is the thing that ye shall do; A third part of you that enter in on the sabbath shall even be keepers of the watch of the king’s house;
verses.verse_html: 5And he commanded them, saying, This is the thing that ye shall do; A third part of you that enter in on the sabbath shall even be keepers of the watch of the king’s house;

verses.text_plain: And a third part shall be at the gate of Sur; and a third part at the gate behind the guard: so shall ye keep the watch of the house, that it be not broken down.
verses.verse_html:
6And a third part shall be at the gate of Sur; and a third part at the gate behind the guard: so shall ye keep the watch of the house, that it be not broken down. ▼
▼ that…: or, from breaking up

tokens.text: that it be not broken down

footnotes.body_html: ▼ that…: or, from breaking up

verses.text_plain: And two parts of all you that go forth on the sabbath, even they shall keep the watch of the house of the Lord about the king.
verses.verse_html:
7And two parts of all you that go forth on the sabbath, even they shall keep the watch of the house of the Lord about the king. ▼
▼ parts: or, companies: Heb. hands

tokens.text: of all you that go forth

footnotes.body_html: ▼ parts: or, companies: Heb. hands

verses.text_plain: And ye shall compass the king round about, every man with his weapons in his hand: and he that cometh within the ranges, let him be slain: and be ye with the king as he goeth out and as he cometh in.
verses.verse_html: 8And ye shall compass the king round about, every man with his weapons in his hand: and he that cometh within the ranges, let him be slain: and be ye with the king as he goeth out and as he cometh in.

tokens.text: and be ye with the king

verses.text_plain: And the captains over the hundreds did according to all things that Jehoiada the priest commanded: and they took every man his men that were to come in on the sabbath, with them that should go out on the sabbath, and came to Jehoiada the priest.
verses.verse_html: 9And the captains over the hundreds did according to all things that Jehoiada the priest commanded: and they took every man his men that were to come in on the sabbath, with them that should go out on the sabbath, and came to Jehoiada the priest.

tokens.text: with them that should go out

verses.text_plain: And to the captains over hundreds did the priest give king David’s spears and shields, that were in the temple of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 10And to the captains over hundreds did the priest give king David’s spears and shields, that were in the temple of the Lord.

verses.text_plain: And the guard stood, every man with his weapons in his hand, round about the king, from the right corner of the temple to the left corner of the temple, along by the altar and the temple.
verses.verse_html:
11And the guard stood, every man with his weapons in his hand, round about the king, from the right corner of the temple to the left corner of the temple, along by the altar and the temple. ▼
▼ corner: Heb. shoulder

verses.text_plain: And he brought forth the king’s son, and put the crown upon him, and gave him the testimony; and they made him king, and anointed him; and they clapped their hands, and said, God save the king.
verses.verse_html:
12And he brought forth the king’s son, and put the crown upon him, and gave him the testimony; and they made him king, and anointed him; and they clapped their hands, and said, God save the king. ▼
▼ God…: Heb. Let the king live

footnotes.body_text: ▼ God…: Heb. Let the king live
footnotes.body_html: ▼ God…: Heb. Let the king live

verses.text_plain: And when Athaliah heard the noise of the guard and of the people, she came to the people into the temple of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 13And when Athaliah heard the noise of the guard and of the people, she came to the people into the temple of the Lord.

verses.text_plain: And when she looked, behold, the king stood by a pillar, as the manner was, and the princes and the trumpeters by the king, and all the people of the land rejoiced, and blew with trumpets: and Athaliah rent her clothes, and cried, Treason, Treason.
verses.verse_html: 14And when she looked, behold, the king stood by a pillar, as the manner was, and the princes and the trumpeters by the king, and all the people of the land rejoiced, and blew with trumpets: and Athaliah rent her clothes, and cried, Treason, Treason.

verses.text_plain: But Jehoiada the priest commanded the captains of the hundreds, the officers of the host, and said unto them, Have her forth without the ranges: and him that followeth her kill with the sword. For the priest had said, Let her not be slain in the house of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 15But Jehoiada the priest commanded the captains of the hundreds, the officers of the host, and said unto them, Have her forth without the ranges: and him that followeth her kill with the sword. For the priest had said, Let her not be slain in the house of the Lord.

verses.text_plain: And they laid hands on her; and she went by the way by the which the horses came into the king’s house: and there was she slain.
verses.verse_html: 16And they laid hands on her; and she went by the way by the which the horses came into the king’s house: and there was she slain.

verses.text_plain: And Jehoiada made a covenant between the Lord and the king and the people, that they should be the Lord’s people; between the king also and the people.
verses.verse_html: 17And Jehoiada made a covenant between the Lord and the king and the people, that they should be the Lord’s people; between the king also and the people.

tokens.text: that they should be the Lord’s

verses.text_plain: And all the people of the land went into the house of Baal, and brake it down; his altars and his images brake they in pieces thoroughly, and slew Mattan the priest of Baal before the altars. And the priest appointed officers over the house of the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
18And all the people of the land went into the house of Baal, and brake it down; his altars and his images brake they in pieces thoroughly, and slew Mattan the priest of Baal before the altars. And the priest appointed officers over the house of the Lord. ▼
▼ officers: Heb. offices

verses.text_plain: And he took the rulers over hundreds, and the captains, and the guard, and all the people of the land; and they brought down the king from the house of the Lord, and came by the way of the gate of the guard to the king’s house. And he sat on the throne of the kings.
verses.verse_html: 19And he took the rulers over hundreds, and the captains, and the guard, and all the people of the land; and they brought down the king from the house of the Lord, and came by the way of the gate of the guard to the king’s house. And he sat on the throne of the kings.

verses.text_plain: And all the people of the land rejoiced, and the city was in quiet: and they slew Athaliah with the sword beside the king’s house.
verses.verse_html: 20And all the people of the land rejoiced, and the city was in quiet: and they slew Athaliah with the sword beside the king’s house.

verses.text_plain: Seven years old was Jehoash when he began to reign.
verses.verse_html: 21Seven years old was Jehoash when he began to reign.
